name: Extreme Mining [early beta]
description:
Become rich by collecting valuable ores and gemstones through mining! Take up your gun and long range pickaxe to break rocks to gather wealth. Spend money at the shop to upgrade your abilities and extend the game.

Defeat enemies to fill up the boss bar. Spawning bosses increases the game's difficulty and rewards for more advanced store options.

WASD to move

Left click to shoot

Right click to throw a powerful pickaxe

Green circles are safe zones for enemy spawns.

---

WARNING: This is early access. Nothing is finalized, art is temporary, and balance is something that will happen in the future :)

Known bugs:

  • Buttons may take a click or two to register sometimes.

PLANNED IMPROVEMENTS:

  • More enemy types
  • Controller support
  • Better artwork
  • More SFX and music
  • Multiple boss types
